value.0:
Pearls is formed of layers of tchazar (aragonite) around a bit of grit or other irritant, growing inside a mollusk over the span of a few years. This slow process give pearls a smooth surface with a deep, rich luster.

Pearls are considered sacred by followers of Deep Sashelas and Dugmaren Brightmantle--appropriate for sacrifice, or to be consecrated for use, or recognized as boons or omens when found. Specifically, white pearls are sacred to followers of Savras, and black pearls are sacred to followers of Shargaas and Vhaeraun.
